players.name: Alice
memory: Diana: "Alice, you seem very quiet. Do you have any thoughts on who might be the mafia? We need to start sharing suspicions to avoid more deaths."
Charlie: "Alice is the mafia. I investigated her last night."
Diana: "Alice, if Charlie investigated you and claims you're mafia, why would he say that if it wasn't true? Can you explain why he would lie?"
You: "Alice is innocent! Charlie is trying to frame me to cover his own tracks. Why would he accuse me without proof right after Bob was killed? Diana, let's focus on finding the real mafia."
Charlie: "Alice is the mafia, and I have nothing to gain by lying. Bob was killed, and I am trying to protect the town. Diana, we need to trust each other and vote Alice out now."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Alice, Diana voted for Charlie
